parameters.name: north
parameters.description: A number for rotation from north.

parameters.name: radiance-parameters
parameters.description: The radiance parameters for ray tracing. The value for ambient bounces will be set to 0 and 1 for direct sunlight and direct sky steps.

parameters.name: sensor-count
parameters.description: The maximum number of grid points per parallel execution

parameters.name: sensor-grids
parameters.description:
A list of input grid names (e.g. room). These grids must be available under
model/grids folder.
